Articles.Content:
My take on the General Dynamics F-111 Aardvark,

The Purple Space Corp. 111 Anteater!

Turn ASAS on, and take off at about 100 m/s. Be very careful when nosing down or the craft will spin out of control. Rolls fine with ASAS. Disable temporarily when attempting to turn.

Ship:

Reference:
The rear of this plane just looks... wrong, with the clipping fuel tanks. Try someone\'s di- or bi-coupler.

Tosh\'s di-coupler looks even stranger. The middle of the fuselage has a gap in it, and the tail is split into two parts. There\'s nowhere to put the tail fin. I saw others clipping the fuel tanks for visual effect - I think it works ok.
